subject: Horse Racing
Boycotts
Horses
lead_paragraph: Jockeys are refusing to ride horses owned by Michael Gill, citing repeated instances in which they have broken down. Gill says the racing surface at a Pennsylvania track is to blame.
snippet: Jockeys are refusing to ride horses owned by Michael Gill, citing repeated instances in which they have broken down. Gill says the racing surface at a Pennsylvania track is to blame.
